author: thezim
body: Had instance were an OpenSSL process was failing with little help from OpenSSL as to why. Having an output of the exact command being executed would helped me solve my problem alot sooner.

comments.author: sarithsutha
comments.body: @ SteveL-MSFT I'm interested in taking this up

comments.author: SteveL-MSFT
comments.body: @sarithsutha awesome!  unfortunately, GitHub only allows certain people to be assigned, so consider this assigned to you until you say otherwise!

title: Add -WhatIf support to Start-Process.
